    Mapping with MACEReports

    MACEReports

    Functions used in creating MACE Cruise Reports

    How to install the package

    1. First, install the Devtools package if needed.

    install.packages("devtools")

    1. Load the Devtools package.

    library(devtools)

    1. Load MACEReports

    devtools::install_github('mike-levine/MACEReports')

    More information can be found on the MACEReports page
